markdownRemark.html:
Overview

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Previous</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 4">4</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 5">5</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Next</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

States

Current

Use aria-current="page" or aria-current="true" on a link to indicate that the link is the current page or item.

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Previous</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a
            class="env-pagination__link"
            aria-current="true"
            href="#"
            aria-label="Current Page, Page 2"
            >2</a
         >
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Next</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

Disabled

Any element except button without a href attribute is considered disabled. Buttons are disabled using the disabled attribute. If you must use a link, remove the href attribute and set the aria-disabled="true" and aria-role="link" attributes.

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <span class="env-pagination__link">Previous</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Next</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

Alignment

Center

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination env-pagination--center">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Previous</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Next</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

End

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination env-pagination--end">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Previous</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#">Next</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

Sizes

Small

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination env-pagination--small">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

Large

<nav aria-label="Pagination example">
   <ul class="env-pagination env-pagination--large">
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 1">1</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 2">2</a>
      </li>
      <li class="env-pagination__item">
         <a class="env-pagination__link" href="#" aria-label="Page 3">3</a>
      </li>
   </ul>
</nav>

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: The Pagination component provides accessible navigation for multi-page content, with customizable alignment and sizing options.

frontmatter.title: Basic colors
frontmatter.description: The Basic colors section defines general colors for backgrounds, text, links, and borders.

frontmatter.title: Block colors
frontmatter.description: The Block colors section offers preset color combinations for large content areas.

frontmatter.title: Brand colors
frontmatter.description: The Brand Colors section defines primary brand hues with contrast-friendly shades for accessibility.

frontmatter.title: Element colors
frontmatter.description: The Element Colors section defines specific shades for buttons, icons, and interactive elements.

frontmatter.title: Status colors
frontmatter.description: The Status Colors section provides distinct hues representing success, warnings, errors, and informational states.

frontmatter.title: Accordion
frontmatter.description: The Accordion component toggles the visibility of content sections, allowing users to expand or collapse them.

frontmatter.title: Alert
frontmatter.description: The Alert component displays brief, important messages to users, with variations for success, warning, danger, and info alerts.

frontmatter.title: Badge
frontmatter.description: Use the Badge component to display small labels for status, notifications, or event counts.

frontmatter.title: Breadcrumb
frontmatter.description: Use breadcrumbs to display the users location within a sites hierarchy, enhancing navigation.

frontmatter.title: Cards
frontmatter.description: Cards are simple containers for displaying information about pages, groups, or users.

frontmatter.title: Collapse
frontmatter.description: The Collapse component toggles content visibility, allowing sections to expand or collapse as needed.

frontmatter.title: Dropdown
frontmatter.description: Dropdowns displays a list of options that appears upon user interaction.

frontmatter.title: Dialog
frontmatter.description: Use Dialog to present modal dialogs with customizable sizes, animations, and focus management.

frontmatter.title: Embedded
frontmatter.description: The Embedded component displays images and text with flexible layouts and overlay options.

frontmatter.title: Image viewer
frontmatter.description: The Image Viewer component displays slideshows and lightbox galleries with navigation controls.

frontmatter.title: Icons
frontmatter.description: The Icon component simplifies icon integration with customizable styles.

frontmatter.title: List
frontmatter.description: The List component displays items in vertical or horizontal layouts, with optional dividers.

frontmatter.title: Media
frontmatter.description: The Media component is used to present user activity chronologically.

frontmatter.title: Navigation
frontmatter.description: The Navigation component provides customizable menus for site navigation, including menubars and side navigation.

frontmatter.title: News item
frontmatter.description: The News Item component presents news content with images and text in a structured layout.

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: The Pagination component provides accessible navigation for multi-page content, with customizable alignment and sizing options.

frontmatter.title: Popover
frontmatter.description: Popovers displays contextual overlays with customizable content, positioning, and trigger options.

frontmatter.title: Profile image
frontmatter.description: The Profile Image component displays images with fixed or responsive sizes.

frontmatter.title: Spinner
frontmatter.description: The Spinner component displays loading animations with standard or bounce styles and optional delays.

frontmatter.title: Tab
frontmatter.description: The Tab component organizes content into sections, displaying one panel at a time.

frontmatter.title: Table
frontmatter.description: Use a Table to display data in rows and columns, with customizable styles and responsive layouts.

frontmatter.title: Toast
frontmatter.description: Use the Toast component to display brief, customizable notifications to inform users of system events.

frontmatter.title: Progress indicator
frontmatter.description: The Progress Indicator component displays progress with customizable colors, labels, and animations.

frontmatter.title: Tooltip
frontmatter.description: Use Tooltip to display brief, informative messages when users hover over or focus on elements.

frontmatter.title: Basics
frontmatter.description: Basics of designing a dashboard widget

frontmatter.title: Responsive widgets
frontmatter.description: Use CSS container queries to make widgets responsive to different sizes.

frontmatter.title: Widget colors
frontmatter.description: The widget color palette provides a set of colors that can be used to style widgets.

frontmatter.title: Widget components
frontmatter.description: Styles for widget components such as labels, values, and badges.

frontmatter.title: Widget CSS variables
frontmatter.description: Additional CSS variables for styling dashboard widgets.

frontmatter.title: Widget typography
frontmatter.description: Typography guidelines for dashboard widgets.

frontmatter.title: Button group
frontmatter.description: Button Group groups related buttons together, providing a unified interface for multiple actions.

frontmatter.title: Button
frontmatter.description: Button provides interactive elements with various styles, sizes, and icon options.

frontmatter.title: Form elements
frontmatter.description: Form elements structures user inputs with labels, controls, and consistent spacing.

frontmatter.title: Form layout
frontmatter.description: Form Layout offers structured classes for creating accessible, consistent, and responsive form layouts.

frontmatter.title: Range slider
frontmatter.description: The Range Slider component lets users select a value or range with customizable intervals and limits.

frontmatter.title: Tag Select
frontmatter.description: Tag Select enables customizable multi-select interfaces with cross-browser support and styling.

frontmatter.title: Cardholder
frontmatter.description: A Cardholder utilizes CSS grid or flexbox to create a responsive card grid that adapts to available space.

frontmatter.title: Container
frontmatter.description: The Container utility establishes a containment context for applying container query at-rules.

frontmatter.title: Flexbox
frontmatter.description: Use the Flexbox utility to provide classes for flexible layouts, including direction, alignment, and wrapping.

frontmatter.title: Basic text
frontmatter.description: The Basic Text utility offers classes for headings, alignment, transformations, status colors, and links.

frontmatter.title: Dynamic font size
frontmatter.description: The Dynamic Font Size utility scales an elements base font size based on container width.

frontmatter.title: Text lists
frontmatter.description: Text lists are used for ordered and unordered lists in text content.

frontmatter.title: Content text
frontmatter.description: Text is designed to be used for content text. It is a versatile and flexible set of site fonts that can be used for a wide range of purposes.

frontmatter.title: UI Text
frontmatter.description: UI Text provides standardized styles for headings and text across templates, components, and applications.

frontmatter.title: CSS variables
frontmatter.description: CSS Variables utility offers predefined custom properties for consistent styling across components.

frontmatter.title: Display
frontmatter.description: The Display utility provides classes to set an elements display property, such as inline, block, flex, inline-block, inline-flex, or none.

frontmatter.title: Shadows
frontmatter.description: Use the Shadows utility classes to apply various sized shadows to elements.

frontmatter.title: Sizing
frontmatter.description: The Sizing utility offers classes to define elements width and height using preset values.

frontmatter.title: Spacing
frontmatter.description: The Spacing utility provides classes for consistent margin and padding adjustments across elements.

frontmatter.title: Vertical alignment
frontmatter.description: The Vertical Alignment utility offers classes to align elements  baseline, top, middle, bottom, text-top, and text-bottom.

frontmatter.title: Assistive text
frontmatter.description: Assistive text provides helpful context, guidance, or feedback for improved accessibility and user understanding.

frontmatter.title: Borders
frontmatter.description: Use the Borders utility to set or remove borders.
